Title:
Cattle in a corral
Creator:
Iddings, John Edward
Date Created:
1927
Description:
Dairy heifers, likely pregnant, standing in a corrall.
Subjects:
Cows Livestock
Source:
MG 76, Edward John Iddings. Scrapbooks, 1904-1954, University of Idaho Library Special Collections and Archives
Source Identifier:
MG 76, Box 3, Slide 149
Type:
Image;StillImage
Format:
image/jpg

Rights
Material has been determined to be in Public Domain as it was created by a University of Idaho professor. For more information, please contact University of Idaho Library Special Collections and Archives Department at libspec@uidaho.edu.

John Edward Iddings' Lantern Slide Collection

Edward John Iddings was the Dean of the College of Agriculture at UI from 1915 to 1946. These slides depict agricultural and university-related scenes from Idaho, as well as images from Iddings' travels.
